text: Iyyoyopeyo tuntumisye mmwejo (Muhammadi ﷺ) ku nkutula wajapite paujo pakwe mikutula jine, kuti mwaasoomele yatun’juwulile, nambo wanganyao akunkana Ar-Rahman (Jwaukoto wejinji). Jilani: “Jwalakwe ni M’mbuje gwangu, pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuwajilwa kun’galagatila) ikaweje Jwelepejo. Kukwakwe njegamiile, soni Kukwakwe ni kwakuujila kwangu pakutenda toba.”
